verse.name: v1
lines: Yesu tu hi hai tu hi hai hamara Prabhu -2

verse.name: v2
lines: Karte hain Teri hum Stuti,  Hriday ke gehraiyon se -2
Yesu Tu hi hai Tu hi hai  hamara Prabhu -2

verse.name: v3
lines: Aatma aur saccchayion se Teri aaradhna kareinge-2
oonch aur oonch sab se ooncha rahe Tera naam - 2

verse.name: v4
lines: Karte hain Teri hum Stuti,  Hriday ke gehraiyon se -2
Yesu Tu hi hai Tu hi hai  hamara Prabhu -2
